content: --अटः (खेऽटः) {1} a planet. {2} Rāhu, the ascending node.

खेट {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [खे अटति, अट् अच्; खिट्-अच् वा] Having a weapon, armed. --टः {@--1@} A village, small town or hamlet. {@--2@} Phlegm. {@--3@} The club of Balarāma. {@--4@} A horse. --टः, --टं {@--1@} Hunting, chase. {@--2@} A shield. --टं {@--1@} Grass. {@--2@} Hide, skin. ({%<ab>N. B.</ab>%} At the end of <ab>comp.</ab> खेट expresses ‘defectiveness’ or ‘deterioration’, & may be rendered by ‘miserable’, ‘low’, ‘vile’, ‘wretched’ &c.; नगरखेटं a miserable town.)
